description: Numbers n such that 5^n - 4^n is prime.
comments: Some of the larger entries may only correspond to probable primes.5^1663 - 4^1663, a 1163-digit number, has been certified prime with Primo. - _Rick L. Shepherd_, Nov 13 20024 more terms found by Predrag Minovic in 2004: 35449, 36697, 45259, 91493. Corresponding numbers of decimal digits are 24778, 25651, 31635, 63951. - _Alexander Adamchuk_, Dec 02 2006
author: _Mike Oakes_, Feb 23 2001
extensions: New term 246497 found by Jean-Louis Charton in 2008 corresponding to a probable prime with 172295 digits - _Jean-Louis Charton_, Sep 02 2009
New term a(19) = 265007 found by _Jean-Louis Charton_, Feb 19 2013
